RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 27. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLDEN MONEY had speed from the start three wide, made the lead after a quarter, battled through the turn, edged clear under right handed urging and won going away under a strong hand ride. TIZ A RUSH slow early, circled rivals quickly five wide through the turn and got up for second. OAKEN stalked the pace four wide, drew on even terms for the lead on the turn, dueled into the stretch and finished determinedly two wide. CRAZYCANTBERIGHTED moved up five wide into the turn then came up empty. PLATE IT UP failed to menace. JACK BE FAST pressed the early pace along the rail and dropped back on the turn. OLE WATASHI set the early pace two wide, had speed for a half then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Jack Be Fast
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, dropped back turn,

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, took over 7/16pole, drew clear, right handed urging

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter Sheppell & K. C. Garret Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz a Rush
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, quick move, 5 wide, gained second

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Crazycantberighted
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 5 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Ole Watashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: early pace 2 wide, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Oaken
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, finished determinedly 2wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 75. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEAM GOLD DIGGER never far back, closed willingly two wide through the stretch under right handed urging and was along in time. GRAN MAMIBELLA stalked the early pace three wide, made the lead early on the turn, shook clear in upper stretch then couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. COURTLY battled for the early lead along the rail, dropped back on the turn, shifted out to the five path in upper stretch and came on again late. BLAZING ZENNA failed to menace. MIRACLE DRUG (IRE) was no factor. LADY LEAH matched strides for the early lead two wide and faltered in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Courtly
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside early, dropped back turn, shifted 5path, came again

ENTRY.NAME: Gran Mamibella
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, assumed command turn, shook clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Miracle Drug (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Blazing Zenna
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Team Gold Digger
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly 2 wide, right urging, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Leah
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide early, faltered lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 27. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGICGIRL always within striking distance, closed willingly three wide under right handed urging, made the lead in mid stretch and drew clear under a strong hand ride. SABELLE away alertly, set the pace until mid stretch then was no match for the winner. KINGSTON TIME never far back, finished with good courage along the rail. MAMBO DANCER chased the pace into the stretch and was outfinished two wide. BLACK BUTTE hopped at the start and failed to menace. CARISMATICA had brief speed. FLYING BUSINESS trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Business
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Kingston Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Sabelle
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Magicgirl
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, closed willingly, 3 wide, right handed urging, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, outfinished 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Carismatica
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Butte
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 12600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 27. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (O hio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ACROSS THE AISLE allowed to settle, circled rivals three wide through the far turn, made the lead near the furlong marker, drifted to the seven path and proved best in a stiff drive. SKIDSTREAM away alertly, set the pace until mid stretch, drifted to the six path and finished gamely for second. IT'S FATE with the second flight inside, offered a mild bid between rivals two wide nearing the quarter pole then was outfinished. SAY HEY KID trailed into the far turn, swung wide and passed tiring rivals. NOBLE BEHAVIOR vied for the lead three wide into the stretch and weakened. ALGORIX had brief speed. BALTIC FLEET hopped inward at the start, pressed the early pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: It's Fate
ENTRY.OWNER: Agostini Arthur O and Lilius Henrik
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, middle move, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Algorix
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Skidstream
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, drifted 6p, game second

ENTRY.NAME: Say Hey Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Baltic Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped inward start, pressed 2w, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Across the Aisle
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, closed willingly 3w, far turn, long drive, proved best

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pollock Farms, Hugh Owen, T & CKentucky, Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Behavior
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Claiming Purse 16300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEASTFROMTHEEAST with the second flight two wide, swung wide entering the stretch, rallied under right handed urging through deep stretch and got up in the final strides in the eight path. GEHRIG pressed the pace two wide, was herded out to the seven path entering the stretch, made the lead in the final stages and just missed hanging on. THE COOKIE MAN away alertly, set the pace along the inside, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, maintained a narrow lead until deep stretch then was outfinished. O CIGANO saved ground while close up early and faded in the stretch. MALIBU CLASSIC was no factor. DUEL FUEL broke slowly and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Duel Fuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Beastfromtheeast
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, swung wide, up in final strides, 8path

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, drifted 6path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led late, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 49. Claiming Purse 20800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VEGAS PLAYER sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace under pressure and proved best under left handed urging in a stretch long drive. INDY CARR pressured the winner two wide and just missed getting up in time. NOSEY POWER never far back, offered a mild bid three wide nearing the quarter pole then leveled off. ORLEANS STORM close up along the inside, failed to respond. JOHN PHILIP was void of early speed and no threat. KING PATRIOT was fractious in the gate, broke slowly, had speed through the turn then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: King Patriot
ENTRY.COMMENT: fractious in gate, broke slowly, speed turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Orleans Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, inside, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Vegas Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, long drive, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Indy Carr
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: John Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 16600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MARCH 27. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals P referred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHADOW TRACER drifted out at the start, dueled for the early lead two wide, inherited a clear advantage entering the turn, widened into the stretch while getting quick fractions and won in hand. VENETIAN DREAM was bumped hard at the start. had a mild late rally in the three path and finished second best. HAPPILEA was guided out bumping hard with BOURBON OVER ICE at the start forcing that one into VENETIAN DREAM, chased the pace in the five path and went evenly. BOURBON OVER ICE was bumped hard then squeezed at the start and failed to menace. MASTER battled for the early lead along the rail then stopped. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF BOUTBON OVER ICE LODGED CLAIMS OF FOUL AGAINIST THE RIDERS OF HAPPILEA AND VENETIAN DREAM FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE START. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED HAPPILEA AND PLACED HIM FOURTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out start, battled 2 wide, drew off, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Happilea
ENTRY.COMMENT: guided out start, bumped hard, chased 5path, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Over Ice
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard squeezed start, jockey claimed foul,

ENTRY.NAME: Venetian Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard start. mild rally 3path, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 66. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CONTROLLER was washy in the post parade, drifted out bumping the runner up at the start, prompted the pace three wide into the far turn, gained a narrow lead, battled until deep stretch and drew clear. A PRAYER FOR KIDS was bumped at the start, trailed for nearly a half, rallied determinedly in the five path through the stretch and finished second best. TIER ONE pressed the pace two wide, dueled through the far turn and into the stretch until the final stages and was outfinished. SPECIALIZED set a slow pace along the inside into the far turn, dug in when headed, matched strides until deep stretch and was outfinished. BRONZE KETTLE was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Specialized
ENTRY.COMMENT: set slow pace, pressured, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bronze Kettle
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Controller
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: washy post parade, drifted out, bumped start, wore down rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: A Prayer for Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, rallied 5path, second best,
